metadata.Title: CVE-2018-0498 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
ARM mbed TLS before 2.12.0, before 2.7.5, and before 2.1.14 allows local users to achieve partial plaintext recovery (for a CBC based ciphersuite) via a cache-based side-channel attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-0498` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmbedcrypto7 - 2.12.0-1
libmbedtls14 - 2.12.0-1
libmbedx509-1 - 2.12.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.12.0-1').
